name: Aligned
desc: This item is good or evil and gains a boost to its powers when its user commits an act of that alignment.

name: Bond
desc: This item is magically bonded to its user, and allows them to conjure it if it is not on their person. If already bonded to another, the bond may be difficult to break.

name: Critical Hitter
desc: This item has some special effect when its user scores a critical hit.

name: Distant
desc: This item works at a much longer range than similar items of its type.

name: Edible
desc: This item can be eaten.

name: Friend
desc: This grants advantage on charisma checks made to interact with creatures of a certain type.

name: Hidden Secret
desc: This item contains a hidden message or other secret that only appears under certain conditions.

name: Illusory Appearance
desc: Illusions mask this item's true form. Its user might be able to manipulate these illusions.

name: Indestructible
desc: This item is immune to all damage except one specific type, or it can only be destroyed through special means.

name: Invisibile
desc: This item can be made invisible while worn or carried.

name: Item Destroyer
desc: This item is extra effective at destroying inanimate objects.

name: Lie Detector
desc: This item grants a bonus or advantage on checks to determine if a creature is lying.

name: Life-granter/Life-stealer
desc: Small life forms such as grass, flowers, or insects grow or wither in this item's presence.

name: Lightweight
desc: This item weighs very little.

name: Lunar/Solar
desc: In the sunlight or moonlight, this gains a boost to its abilities. A lunar item might instead gain powers under the full moon.

name: Multipurpose
desc: In addition to its main purpose, this item can also be used as a weapon, shield, or spellcasting implement.

name: Nondetection
desc: This item makes no sound and leaves no trace of its presence.

name: Planar
desc: This item is attuned to a particular plane of existence other than the material plane, and has some special effect while on that plane. For instance, an item attuned to the shadowfell might make its user immune to shadowfell despair.

name: Predictive
desc: This item can accurately predict the weather up to a few days into the future.

name: Reactive
desc: When the user of this item sees an ally be attacked, take damage, or some other trigger, they can use their reaction to grant them a boon of some kind.

name: Self Destruct
desc: This item has some powerful magical effect that activates when it is destroyed.

name: Timepiece
desc: This item displays the current date, time, or phase of the moon, or it displays a countdown until a certain event.

name: Traceable
desc: The user of this item knows its location when it is not on their person, or they can follow the path it has traveled since they last had it. This property may not work if the item is too far away, on a different plane of existence, or protected by abjuration magic or solid lead.

name: Unmoving
desc: This item prevents its user from being moved against their will.

name: Watcher
desc: This item might warn its user of approaching danger, making them unable to be surprised and granting a small initiative bonus.

name: Blissful
desc: While in possession of the item, the bearer feels fortunate and optimistic about what the future holds. Butterflies and other harmless creatures might frolic in the item’s presence.

name: Confident
desc: The item helps its bearer feel self-assured.

name: Muttering
desc: The item grumbles and mutters. A creature who listens carefully to the item might learn something useful.

name: Diary
desc: The item depicts the entire history of the person who holds it up to that particular point in time. The story shows even chapters of their life that they are unable or unwilling to remember.

name: Electrical Immunity
desc: The item gives its bearer immunity from non-magical electricity.

name: Environmental Immunity
desc: The bearer does not get wet in the rain and is otherwise unaffected by the natural climate around him.

name: Essence of Undeath
desc: The item disguises the essence of the bearer as that of an undead creature. The character’s true nature does not change, but he appears to be a supernatural creature to onlookers. Any lesser undead creature (such as animated corpses or mindless specters) automatically consider the character one of them. Any other character who looks at the bearer's essence sees only the necromantic energy shrouding them.

name: Feline Empathy
desc: All cats feel empathy for the item's carrier.

name: Guardian of Truth
desc: The item reveals when someone is lying to it's owner by changing color slightly. It does not determine what someone is lying about, nor does it offer more information. The character needs to actually be able to hear the lie for the item to work (text or gestures do not provoke any reaction) and the person lying must be doing so consciously, and not because they mistakenly holds a false belief to be true.

name: Hiss
desc: The bearer can communicate with any reptile.

name: Luminosity
desc: Increases or decreases the ambient light in a certain area around the character. This ability cannot illuminate a place that completely lacks light or completely extinguish the light of a place that is lit.

name: Naturalize
desc: In the presence of this item, plants begin to gain life and color. These plants also grow and multiply considerably faster than usual.

name: Non-Magical
desc: This item does not emit magical power, so it cannot be detected or analyzed as a magical artifact.

name: Pristine
desc: The item does not burn, get wet, or get dirty.

name: Tongue of the Tarantula
desc: The item gives its owner a bonus to persuasion and etiquette.

name: Unbreakable
desc: This item cannot be broken in any known manner.

name: Undetectable
desc: The magic in this item cannot be detected.

name: Without Shadow
desc: The bearer and anything they carry do not cast a shadow.

name: Gleaming
desc: This item never gets dirty.

name: Harmonious
desc: Attuning to this item takes only 1 minute.

name: Hidden Message
desc: A message is hidden somewhere on the item. It might be visible only at a certain time of the year, under the light of one phase of the moon, or in a specific location.

name: Key
desc: The item is used to unlock a container, chamber, vault, or other entryway.

name: Sentinel
desc: Choose a kind of creature that is an enemy of the item’s creator. This item glows faintly when such creatures are within 120 feet of it.

name: Unbreakable
desc: The item can’t be broken. Special means must be used to destroy it.

name: War Leader
desc: The bearer can use an action to cause his or her voice to carry clearly for up to 300 feet until the end of the bearer’s next turn.

name: Waterborne
desc: This item floats on water and other liquids. Its bearer has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to swim.

name: Transforming
desc: This item can transform into a different type of item with a different function, or many different types of item. For instance, a sword that can transform into a bladed whip, or hide itself by transforming into a cane.

name: Illusion
desc: The item is imbued with illusion magic, allowing its bearer to alter the item’s appearance in minor ways. Such alterations don’t change how the item is worn, carried, or wielded, and they have no effect on its other magical properties. For example, the wearer could make a red robe appear blue, or make a gold ring look like it’s made of ivory. The item reverts to its true appearance when no one is carrying or wearing it.
